text: (Among those bol Zidovsky some distort words truth they say My hear my disobey Tvoj words falling deaf ears Raa'ena bol our shepherd mat rad they zvitok ich jazyk mock nabozenstvo! Had they said My hear my obey My hear ona Unzurna watch us) it je lepsie for them a righteous. Radsej they incurred condemnation GOD ich disbelief. Consequently majority z them nie verit
